rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0001
rows.name: I can't believe Onii-chan is a Driver now...

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
That means he has to go
to Superbia, right?

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It's gonna be lonely without him, but
I'll be fine. I gave him tons of advice
before he left.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Like, to make sure he stays close
to his Blade when he fights...

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0005
rows.name:
He needs to do that, 'cos that's
how you deepen your Affinity with
your Blade.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0006
rows.name:
And when your Affinity deepens, you
get stronger, and so does your Blade!

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0007
rows.name: You'd do well to remember that too!
